sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import umassLogoUrl from '../assets/umassLogo.png'; import vitLogo from '../assets/vitLogo.png'; const vitLogoUrl = 'https://example.com/vit-logo.png'; const Education = () => { return (
EDUCATION
  • Master's
    • University of Massachusetts Amherst

    Amherst, MA, USA

    Master's of Science - Computer Science

    Sep 2023 - May 2025 (Expected Graduation)

    GPA : 4.0/4.0

    Courses :

    • Fall 2023
      • Distributed Computing and Systems
      • Machine Learning
      • Secure Distributed Systems (Blockchains)
    • Spring 2024
      • Software Engineering
      • Distributed and Operating Systems
      • Business Intelligence and Analytics
  • Bachelor's
    • VIT University

    Vellore, TN, India

    Bachelor's of Technology - Electronics and Communication

    Jul 2014 -Apr2018

    GPA : 3.57/4.0

    Relevant Courses :

    • Data Structures and Algorithms
    • Computer Programming and Problem Solving
    • Computer Organization and Architecture
    • Computer Networks
    • Agent Based Intelligent Systems
    • Human Computer Interaction
); }; export default Education;
